document.full_text: whispers grew to murmurs, rose to grumbling and finally gave way to an hysterical clamor of doubt early in the major league baseball season about whether new york yankees captain derek jeter was washed up.
document.title: yankees' jeter tries to liven up march to 3,000 hits
lines_and_colors: whispers grew to murmurs, rose to grumbling and finally gave way to an hysterical clamor of doubt early in the major league baseball season about whether new york yankees captain derek jeter was washed up.
